title: Our Eyes were Covered, from "The Amman Project"
marks: Signature, Date, Edition and Chop LRC, in pencil: [D. Heyman 2006]
description: line drawing-style portrait of a man in profile (PR) with large nose, thick hair and beard; man wears jacket, dark shirt and tie; text above and to L of figure
